channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Mistral urges telcos to get into the hyperscaler game
item.description: Mistral CEO Arthur Mensch brought a sales pitch to Mobile World Congress on Tuesday, urging delegates at the world’s biggest telecoms confab in Barcel...

item.title: Nothing Phone (3a) and Phone (3a) Pro Review: Budget Excellence
item.description: Nothing's latest budget phones prove that you don't need to spend $600 to get a powerful, feature-packed phone.

item.title: 7 Best Bidets, Tested and Reviewed (2025): Toto, Kohler, Tushy
item.description: We plonked our butts on these electric and nonelectric toilet seats to see which cleaned best.

item.title: Cino cracks bill-splitting at the moment of payment, raises seed round
item.description: While Venmo or Splitwise are effectively ‘debt collector’ tools, which require one person to pay a full bill and then request funds from others, neith...

item.title: Peacock Promo Codes and Coupons
item.description: Watch your favorite TV shows for less this month and save on a subscription with the latest Peacock coupons from WIRED.

item.title: Dutch startup QuantWare seeks to fast-track quantum computing
item.description: Big tech companies aren’t sleeping on quantum chips: Amazon Web Services introduced Ocelot; Microsoft, Majorana; and Google, Willow. But although all ...

item.title: Moonwatt secures $8.3M to dial up solar’s staying power with sodium-ion storage
item.description: The drive to decarbonize our economies through electrification and clean energy continues to generate momentum around battery technologies, as storage...

item.title: Mach Industries, founded by 21-year-old Ethan Thornton, lands US Army contract, builds weapons factory
item.description: Sequoia-backed Mach Industries, the defense tech founded by 21-year-old Ethan Thornton, landed a contract with the U.S. Army and has plans for its fir...

item.title: Visible Promo Code: Save $10 Per Month in March 2025
item.description: Find great deals and promo codes for Visible at WIRED and save big, whether you're a long-time customer or a newbie.

item.title: How to See the Total Lunar Eclipse and Blood Moon This Month
item.description: On March 14, skywatchers in the Americas will be able to see the first of 2025’s two total lunar eclipses.
